item.title: 8-Year-Old Anaya Lee Willabus is the Youngest Published Female Author of a Chapter Book in the U.S - Guyanese Girls Rock!
item.description:
8-Year-Old Anaya Lee Willabus is the Youngest Published Female Author of a Chapter Book in the U.S - Guyanese Girls Rock!

At the young age of 8, Anaya Lee Willabus will go down in US history as the youngest published female author of a chapter book. She was born in Brooklyn, NY to Guyanese parents, Dimple and Winston Willabus of Georgetown.

item.title: Tamika Newhouse says writers are the real rockstars - Rolling Out
item.description:
Tamika Newhouse says writers are the real rockstars - Rolling Out

When you hear the word author, your brain doesn't conjure up images of celebrity sightings, red carpets and hot parties, but Litish, a new artistic resource, wants to glitz and glam to that picture. Litish is adding The Literary Experience to the CIAA itinerary this year with a savvy author's brunch and panel.

item.title: 18 times Toni Morrison slayed you softly with her words -
item.description:
18 times Toni Morrison slayed you softly with her words -

From her unyielding conviction to write beyond the white gaze, to her profound themes on womanhood, love, the value of black men in America, religion, and colorism, Toni Morrison has said it all...and then some. That's why the author, born Chloe Ardelia Wofford, is celebrated as the First Lady of Literature today.

item.title: Dreams of A Bad Bitch Book Trailer
10 Books Every Young Black Woman Needs to Read in Order to SLAY
item.description:
10 Books Every Young Black Woman Needs to Read in Order to SLAY

Slay: Killed it. Succeed in something amazing. (urban dictionary) In a world where the #BeyHive reigns supreme; everyone wants to possess the superpower to SLAY. Whether it's informing your hairdresser to slay your hair to the Gawds or with a new dress from Forever 21; the objective is always to kill it.

item.title: Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity
item.description:
Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity

Join Entrepreneur and today's most influential business innovators in Denver, May 4. Register Now " Prince, a pioneering musician and creative, died today at 57. This game-changing artist merged his special take on funk and rock into 39 albums, creating classics such as Purple Rain and Little Red Corvette.
